modules.sql: WITH all_events AS (SELECT oe.overdraft_id, oe.fee_amount, oe.fee_waived, oe.as_of, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY oe.as_of ORDER BY oe.overdraft_id) AS rn FROM overdraft_events oe) SELECT ae.fee_waived, ROUND(SUM(ae.fee_amount), 2) AS total_fees, COUNT(*) AS event_count, ROUND(AVG(ae.fee_amount), 2) AS avg_fee, ae.as_of FROM all_events ae GROUP BY ae.fee_waived, ae.as_of ORDER BY ae.fee_waived
